code: import{GET_ERRORS,CLEAR_ERRORS}from"../actions/types";const initialState={};export default function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_ERRORS:return action.payload;case CLEAR_ERRORS:return{};default:return state;}}
